intro: Epilobium × decipiens, commonly known as the hybrid willowherb, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. The plant typically grows in moist, disturbed soils such as along riverbanks and in wet meadows. It has opposite, lance-shaped leaves and produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Epilobium × decipiens is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize soil and provide habitat for various insects.
